locationPermission.title: Allow location?
locationPermission.description: We will request your device location to provide turn-by-turn guidance from your current position. The browser will show a permission prompt next.

map.welcome: Welcome to the smart battery swapping network!
map.desc: Fast, convenient, safe and cost-effective battery swaps for your electric vehicle.

gogoro.title: Gogoro Network
gogoro.desc: The world's most advanced battery swapping system, vehicles recharged in seconds.

slide1.title: Batteries Swapped
slide1.desc: More than 394,634 batteries swapped per day in the last 30 days.

slide2.title: CO₂ Saved
slide2.desc: The same amount of CO₂ as 123,775,611 trees absorb every year.

slide3.title: Total Distance Covered
slide3.desc: Equal to traveling around the Earth's equator 349,351 times.

popup.clickToLoadBattery: Click marker to load battery info

card1.title: Smart mobile swapping
card1.desc: A fast-swapping battery ecosystem that makes electric journeys seamless — swap in seconds and get back on the road.

card2.title: Automated swap stations
card2.desc: Modern automated stations with safe energy storage, 24/7 availability and optimized operations to lower costs.

card3.title: Advanced tech & design
card3.desc: Batteries and stations engineered for durability, safety and smart connectivity via AI and IoT.

projectCard1Contents.title: Smart batteries — super-fast swaps
projectCard1Contents.subtitle: Seconds to swap, energy to continue your trip.
projectCard1Contents.desc: No more waiting to charge. Quick, clean, and convenient swaps powered by modern battery management technology.

projectCard1Contents.title: Next-gen Lithium batteries
projectCard1Contents.subtitle: Safe, long-lived.
projectCard1Contents.desc: Lithium batteries with intelligent management, safety protections, and extended lifecycle.

projectCard1Contents.title: Swap anywhere, anytime
projectCard1Contents.subtitle: Convenient for every journey.
projectCard1Contents.desc: A wide station network enables fast swaps so you never run out of energy on the road.

projectCard2Contents.title: Automated swap stations
projectCard2Contents.subtitle: Save time, reduce cost.
projectCard2Contents.desc: Intelligent stations operating 24/7 with safe storage and support for many vehicle types.

projectCard2Contents.title: Energy storage hubs
projectCard2Contents.subtitle: Safe, modern, eco-friendly.
projectCard2Contents.desc: Storage facilities with smart control systems to improve efficiency and reduce operating costs.

projectCard3Contents.title: Connected management app
projectCard3Contents.subtitle: Control battery, trips, and payments in one tap.
projectCard3Contents.desc: A mobile app to find nearby stations, monitor battery status and history, pay cashless, and receive support.

projectCard3Contents.title: Smart fleet management
projectCard3Contents.subtitle: Track battery and vehicle health.
projectCard3Contents.desc: Tools to monitor battery status, usage history, and maintenance notifications for seamless support.

card1.title: Convenience
card1.desc: EV swap stations use less space than parking and can be installed quickly at many locations. A single swap point can serve hundreds of swaps per day without customers waiting.

card2.title: Easy to operate
card2.desc: Weather-resistant and tamper-proof designs require little maintenance. Remote monitoring and automated safety measures deliver high uptime.

card3.title: Built to last
card3.desc: Robust design, advanced technology, and continuous updates ensure reliability in harsh urban environments, year after year.

battery.platformHeading: The world's most advanced energy platform for electric vehicles

video.title: Thinking ahead.
video.desc: SmartGEN is our cloud-connected neural center. Its AI continuously learns from driving patterns and changing behavior to predict when and where full batteries are needed. By distributing energy intelligently, we help hundreds of thousands of riders keep moving quickly on the road.

pin.videoFallback: Your browser does not support the video tag.
pin.heroDesc: GoStation Sites make swapping batteries a breeze. Way cleaner than gas. Infinitely faster than charging. Full batteries are ready when you are. No waiting. No fumes. No fuss.
pin.introHtml: Gogoro Energy is a leading provider of energy storage solutions with end-to-end capabilities from R&D to manufacturing. Gogoro Energy applies modern Lithium-ion battery technology to deliver energy storage solutions that meet international safety and performance standards.

stats.title: Advanced energy platform for two-wheeler EVs
stats.subtitle: 50+ cities | One platform | 55+ supported models

header.title: Make your experience more
header.subtitle: Say goodbye to refuelling and start swapping batteries.
header.description: Multiple plans so you can ride the way you want. Change anytime, no hidden fees.

pricing.title: Battery swap service plans
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your mobility needs. Plans are flexible and transparent.

tabs.label: Battery Rental Policy
tabs.leftTitle: Applies to Gogoro models (e.g. Ludo, Theon, Vento) and compatible models
left: The deposit will be returned when the rental contract is terminated.
Rental contract duration: open-ended until the customer cancels or no longer requires the service.
Billing cycle: full calendar months, from the first day to the last day of each month.
Subscription fees are collected before the 1st of each month. Customers may pay for one or multiple months in advance.
Payment channels: at authorized dealers or in the provider's app.
tabs.rightNote: Contact the hotline or an agent to switch packages. Prices below are illustrative and subject to change.

plans.name: BASIC PACKAGE
plans.note: Suitable for average usage; includes basic support and periodic swap service.

plans.name: STANDARD PACKAGE
plans.note: Popular package for frequent riders. Unlimited distance included.

items: Only accept batteries handed over by station staff or authorized personnel.
Receive batteries that are intact, not dented, and show no signs of tampering.
Batteries must include original accessories and be the correct model.
No visible burn spots or deformation beyond 1 mm.
No deep scratches (>1 mm), rust, or chemical damage.
Customers must follow the provider's usage and storage guidelines.
Examples requiring compensation: lost battery, removed casing, or damage rendering the battery nonfunctional.
Full replacement price: 8,600,000 VND per battery (incl. VAT).
Minor casing deformation compensation: 770,000 VND per affected part (incl. VAT).
If damage is due to misuse, compensation is assessed case-by-case by the provider.
If the battery is nonfunctional despite proper use, no compensation is required.
